name: culture
title: Level 5 Task
description:
Submit random culture image to <#977772369420640316>.
It should have at least 5 reactions from another members.
Submit your answer (copy link of the message) in following form:

`/lv5 culture <message_link>`

name: culture_react
title: Level 5 Task
description:
React to at least five meme messages in <#977772369420640316>.
Command can be used multiple times.
One link per submition.
Submit your answer (copy link of the message) in following form:

`/lv5 culture_react <message_link>`
